headline: Top US officials renew calls for Ukraine and Russia to seek peace | Reuters
context: May 1 (Reuters) - Two top U.S. officials have renewed calls on Russia and Ukraine to reach a peace deal, with one saying there was no clear end in sight to the conflict in Ukraine and the other warning that President Donald Trump needed a breakthrough "very soon".

The comments, made separately by Vice President JD Vance and Secretary of State Marco Rubio to Fox News, underscored the impatience in Trump's administration over the intractability of the war, now in its fourth year.
